powers.name: White Blow
powers.description: Creates a smoke punch that damages entities.

powers.name: White Snake
powers.description: Creates a smoke punch that will hunt an entity and damage it upon impact.

powers.name: White Out
powers.description: Creates a smoke area around the player that will give slowness to everything inside.

powers.name: White Launcher
powers.description: Player will become immune to any kind of damage (including Fall Damage) and by pressing [SPACE] player can jump in mid air. Also gives the player: Strength III, Speed III and Regeneration III.
